title: How to learn chemical bonding and molecular structures for the NEET - Quora

response.answer_text: Most of the basic things about this subject is you already learnt in tenth class if you haven't done this then I suggest you to listen the class and go through the ncert textbook and start doing the basic problems then your confidence increases then you can go to objective bits

NCERT is bible of these chapters but apart from this I would suggest you to take help from youtube 3D videos or byju's contents are also good enough for these concepts. Er.Dushyant Kumar video's and books are also great,from there you can get some tricks to solve questions within seconds.
